__compat.description: The CustomElementRegistry interface provides methods for registering custom elements and querying registered elements.

chrome.notes: Chrome 36+/Opera 20+ implemented a previous version of Custom Elements (v0) that used `.registerElement()`

safari.notes: Supports 'Autonomous custom elements' but not 'Customized built-in elements'

opera.notes: Supports 'Autonomous custom elements' but not 'Customized built-in elements'

chrome_android.notes: Supports 'Autonomous custom elements' but not 'Customized built-in elements'

webview_android.notes: Supports 'Autonomous custom elements' but not 'Customized built-in elements'

safari_ios.notes: Supports 'Autonomous custom elements' but not 'Customized built-in elements'
